fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Consumers, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Anything SME, Aviation, blockchain, hospitality and Brexit related, which includes the majority of the Commission's work programme.
membership: We are a member of SEAP, the Society of European Affairs Professionals. Through this membership, we ensure to adhere to the stringent code of conduct, as well as contributing to improving the quality of the profession.
customers: Lennoc# Asian Hospitality Federation Europe (AHFE)# ESBA# Association of Passenger Rights Advocates (APRA)
goals__remit: Our organisation represents the interests of our clients towards the European Institutions. One of these clients is the European Small Business Alliance, which has been active in Brussels since 1998. Our main aim is to inform MEPs and Commission officials alike, regarding topics affecting their work and relevant to our clients. We aim for better regulation through constructive dialogue and exchange of information.
